xwikidoc.name: AutoReloadTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Auto Reload Translations
xwikidoc.content: autoreload.start=Start Auto-Reload autoreload.stop=Stop Auto-Reload autoreload.confirmmerge=Content has changed on the server. Would you like to merge your changes and save the document? autoreload.conflicts=The Merge has resulted in conflicts. Would you like to save the version with your changes overriding conflicts? autoreload.savecomplete=Saving is complete. Would you like to reload the editor? autoreload.savefailed=Saving failed autoreload.mergefailed=Merge failed autoreload.wikiconversionfailed=Wiki conversion failed autoreload.exception=An exception occurred while performing the merge autoreload.reload=Content has changed on the server with no local changes. Would you like to reload the editor? autoreload.yes=Yes autoreload.no=No autoreload.realtimeon=Auto-reload cannot be started because realtime is activated autoreload.started=Auto-reload has been activated autoreload.stopped=Auto-reload has been stopped autoreload.reloadpage=Reloading page... autoreload.config.title=Auto-Reload admin.autoreload=Auto-Reload autoreload.config.description=Auto-Reload allows to verify if the content has changed on the server since the last load, both in view and edit mode. In edit mode if the document has changed both on the server and locally then a merge will be attempted. To activate this function, use the "Always activated" setting below or use the added action in the "More actions" menu. XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_viewmode=Settings for View Mode XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwikimode=Settings for Wiki Edit Mode XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwysiwygmode=Settings for Wysiwyg Edit Mode XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_viewmode_ondemand=On-Demand XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_viewmode_always=Always activated XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_viewmode_off=Deactivated XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwikimode_ondemand=On-Demand XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwikimode_always=Always activated XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwikimode_off=Deactivated XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwysiwygmode_ondemand=On-Demand XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwysiwygmode_always=Always activated XWiki.AutoReloadConfigClass_editwysiwygmode_off=Deactivated
